name: The Yeti-ing (PalleMickzy)
description:
Santa has gone nuts, save Christmas. Disrupt Santa's workshop!

Created for the 2019 AIE Disruption Game Jam. Updated version of the one posted on https://mythicalarieal.itch.io/the-yeti-ing. 

Left Click: Pick up Right Click: Throw WASD: To move

Producer/Designer: Meilene Lin-Plebuch

Art Designer: Wyntre Clement

Character Artist: Thomas Aguilar

Environment Artist: Wilson Comer

UI Artist/Texturer: Arieal Rushing

AI Programmer: Samuel Daman

Programmer: Jospeh Fisher
